content.question: Which of the following most likely explains the overall long-term trend in the number of participants in Olympic Games shown in the graph?

choices.label: Increased economic development allowed more nations to participate.
Global competition between capitalism and communism led to some nations boycotting Olympic Games.
Wartime casualties left many nations with insufficient numbers of athletes to send to the games.
The expenses associated with organizing Olympic Games led nations to limit the number of athletes allowed to attend.

content.answer: Increased economic development allowed more nations to participate.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
